trans-unit.source: Changes the color space of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />.
trans-unit.target: Altera o espaço de cores de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />.

trans-unit.source: For XAML usage information, see [ColorConvertedBitmap Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/colorconvertedbitmap-markup-extension.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações de uso XAML, consulte [extensão de Marcação ColorConvertedBitmap](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/colorconvertedbitmap-markup-extension.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> implementa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface para otimizar a inicialização em várias propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Property changes can only occur during object initialization.
trans-unit.target: As alterações de propriedade só podem ocorrer durante a inicialização do objeto.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> to signal that initialization has begun and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> to signal that initialization has completed.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> para sinalizar que a inicialização começou e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> para sinalizar que a inicialização foi concluída.

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Após a inicialização, as alterações de propriedade são ignoradas.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> objects created using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Media.ColorContext%2CSystem.Windows.Media.ColorContext%2CSystem.Windows.Media.PixelFormat%29> constructor are automatically initialized, and property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> os objetos criados com o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Media.ColorContext%2CSystem.Windows.Media.ColorContext%2CSystem.Windows.Media.PixelFormat%29> construtor são inicializados automaticamente e as alterações de propriedade são ignoradas.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> is never cached.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> nunca é armazenada em cache.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> and use it to convert color.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar uma instância de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> e usá-lo para converter cores.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> implementa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface para otimizar a inicialização em várias propriedades.

trans-unit.source: To initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> created using this constructor, you must perform property initialization between <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: Para inicializar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> criado usando este construtor, você deve executar a inicialização de propriedade entre <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> chamadas.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> that is converted.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> que é convertido.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> of the source bitmap.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> do bitmap de origem.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> of the converted bitmap.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> do bitmap convertido.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat" /> of the converted bitmap.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat" /> do bitmap convertido.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> class by using the specified values.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> usando os valores especificados.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> objects created using this constructor are automatically initialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> os objetos criados com esse construtor são inicializados automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Após a inicialização, as alterações de propriedade são ignoradas.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to initialize an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Media.ColorContext%2CSystem.Windows.Media.ColorContext%2CSystem.Windows.Media.PixelFormat%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como inicializar uma instância de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> usando o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.%23ctor%28System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource%2CSystem.Windows.Media.ColorContext%2CSystem.Windows.Media.ColorContext%2CSystem.Windows.Media.PixelFormat%29> construtor.

trans-unit.source: Signals the start of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> initialization.
trans-unit.target: Sinaliza o início da inicialização <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" />.

trans-unit.source: Property initialization must be done between <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: Inicialização de propriedade deve ser feita entre <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> chamadas.

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> has been initialized, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Após o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> tiver sido inicializado, as alterações de propriedade são ignoradas.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> with a set of properties by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como inicializar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap> com um conjunto de propriedades usando o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> is currently being initialized.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> está sendo inicializado no momento.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit" /> has already been called.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit" /> já foi chamado.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> has already been initialized.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> já foi inicializado.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável desse <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" />, fazendo cópias em profundidade dos valores do objeto.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Ao copiar as propriedades de dependência, esse método copia associações de dados e referências de recurso (mas eles não podem mais resolver), mas não animações ou seus valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> do objeto clonado será <see langword="false" />, mesmo se a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> da origem tiver sido <see langword="true." />

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para produzir cópias modificáveis de congelada <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objeto).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a versão herdada com uma implementação fortemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável desse objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap" />, fazendo cópias em profundidade dos valores do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: Referências a recursos, vinculações de dados e animações não são copiadas, mas seus valores atuais são.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> do objeto clonado será <see langword="false" />, mesmo se a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> da origem tiver sido <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para produzir cópias modificáveis de congelada <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objeto).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a versão herdada com uma implementação fortemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that identifies the color profile, as defined by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> class, of the converted bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que identifica o perfil de cor, conforme definido pela classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />, do bitmap convertido.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />.

trans-unit.source: When you make property changes to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>, the changes must be done within a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> block.
trans-unit.target: Quando você faz alterações de propriedade para um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap>, as alterações devem ser feitas em um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.BeginInit%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.ColorConvertedBitmap.EndInit%2A> bloco.
